metadata.title: CVE-2016-2409 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A Texas Instruments (TI) haptic kernel driver in Android 6.x before2016-04-01 allows attackers to gain privileges via a crafted applicationthat leverages control over a service that can call this driver, akainternal bug 25981545.

criterions.comment: linux-mako: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
linux-flo: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
